SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_CHILDREN_REMOVEPENDINGREASON
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Remove a pending reason from all children in a list
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_CHILDREN_REMOVEPENDINGREASON ( @childIDList dbo.USR_UDT_CHILDIDLIST readonly, -- The children to remove a pending reason @sponsorshipReasonID uniqueidentifier = null, -- Used to specify the sponsorship reason to remove by sponsorshipreason id guid. If guid is not null, guid is used instead of text @sponsorshipReasonText nvarchar(100) = '', -- Used to specify the sponsorship reason to remove by case insensitive string - case is ignored when finding the sponsorship reason @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier = null, -- Used to specify change agent for ChangedByID and AddedByID fields @deletedRowcount int = 0 output -- Output parm that specifies how many pending reasons were removed ) as begin -- Constants declare @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility tinyint = 0
-- Get ChangeAgent if none was passed into the sproc if @changeAgentID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @changeAgentID output
-- Used for setting date fields to today's date declare @currentDate datetime = null set @currentDate = getdate()
declare @errorMessage nvarchar(max) -- Used when concatenation is needed in an error message
begin try -- These are required for the sproc to work correctly, so we need to throw an exception if the IDs aren't found
if @sponsorshipReasonID is null begin -- if no sponsorship reason id was specified, find the pending sponsorship reason id using @sponsorshipReasonText
select @sponsorshipReasonID = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = lower (@sponsorshipReasonText) and REASONTYPECODE = @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility
if @sponsorshipReasonID is null begin set @errorMessage = 'Couldn''t find the "' + @sponsorshipReasonText + '" pending sponsorship reason' RAISERROR 1000000 @errorMessage end end else -- Validate the pending sponsorship reason id that was passed in @sponsorshipReasonID if not exists (select ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where ID = @sponsorshipReasonID and REASONTYPECODE = @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkPendingEligibility) begin set @errorMessage = 'Couldn''t find a valid pending sponsorship reason with id = ' + cast (@sponsorshipReasonID as nvarchar(50)) RAISERROR 1000000 @errorMessage end end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
-- This needs to be set to off for the output parms to be set properly set nocount off
-- delete the pending sponsorship reason for the children in @childIDList --exec dbo.USP_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON_DELETEBYID_WITHCHANGEAGENTID delete soreason from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYREASON soreason where exists (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID from @childIDList where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = soreason.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID) and soreason.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @sponsorshipReasonID
set @deletedRowcount = @@ROWCOUNT
return 0
end
